description: Create terminal-native Factorio guide with Rich interactive menu, quick reference, phase navigation, markdown+typst fallbacks, and ASCII layout assets.

- Running `python3 factorio-guide/factorio_guide.py` shows navigable sections (Rich installed)
- Running `python3 factorio-guide/factorio_guide.py --quick` prints ratio tables
- Markdown and Typst fallbacks exist

title: Expand Typst guide to match Markdown
description: The Typst version is currently a starter skeleton. Expand it to mirror factorio-guide/factorio_guide.md content and produce a polished PDF.

title: Install/verify Rich rendering & interactive menu
description: Validate `factorio-guide/factorio_guide.py` with Rich installed: check panels/tables render correctly, interactive menu works, and piping to `less -R` looks good.
